Question
========

A board of three students should be formed of six women and five men. If three names are drawn at random, what is the probability that the committee will consist of all women or all men?

Answerlist
----------

* 2/33
* 4/33
* 6/33
* 1/3
* 1/2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2/33: Incorrect
* 4/33: Incorrect
* 6/33: Correct
* 1/3: Incorrect
* 1/2: Incorrect
